ygData.subject: Paw of Opalla COntainer
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok to save me from weeding through 1000 emails could someone please email me directly the exact location of the Paw Container for the Paw of Opalla quest... I
ygData.messageBody:
Ok to save me from weeding through 1000 emails could someone please email me
directly the exact location of the Paw Container for the Paw of Opalla
quest...
I know it is in the Queynos Aqueducts and I know it is dropped by Vin
Moltor...what I don't know is which entrance to the aqueducts is he closer
to? The North Queynos or South Queynos.....I was down there yesterday and I
really don't feel like waltzing into the Necro Guild...so thank you very
much all :-)
